fields.title: Baked Lemon Herb Salmon
fields.description: Tender salmon fillet baked with lemon, garlic, and fresh herbs.  Served with roasted vegetables.
fields.instructions:
1. Preheat oven to 400°F
2. Season salmon with herbs and garlic
3. Place lemon slices on top
4. Arrange vegetables around salmon
5. Bake for 15-18 minutes
6. Serve with fresh parsley

fields.title: Chicken Stir-Fry with Vegetables
fields.description: Colorful stir-fry with chicken, broccoli, bell peppers, and teriyaki sauce over brown rice.
fields.instructions:
1. Cook brown rice
2. Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces
3. Stir-fry chicken until golden
4. Add vegetables and cook
5. Add teriyaki sauce
6. Serve over rice with sesame seeds

fields.title: Turkey Meatballs with Zucchini Noodles
fields.description: Lean turkey meatballs in marinara sauce served over spiralized zucchini noodles.
fields.instructions:
1. Mix ground turkey with breadcrumbs and spices
2. Form into meatballs and bake
3. Heat marinara sauce
4. Spiralize zucchini
5. Sauté zoodles briefly
6. Top with meatballs and sauce

fields.title: Vegetable Curry with Chickpeas
fields.description: Creamy coconut curry with chickpeas, sweet potato, and spinach. Served with basmati rice.
fields.instructions:
1. Sauté onions and curry paste
2. Add diced sweet potato
3. Pour in coconut milk
4. Add chickpeas and vegetables
5. Simmer until vegetables are tender
6. Serve with rice and cilantro

fields.title: Grilled Chicken Fajitas
fields.description: Sizzling chicken fajitas with peppers and onions, served with warm tortillas and toppings.
fields.instructions:
1. Marinate chicken in lime and spices
2. Grill chicken and slice
3. Sauté peppers and onions
4. Warm tortillas
5. Assemble fajitas
6. Serve with salsa, guacamole, and sour cream

fields.title: Baked Cod with Roasted Vegetables
fields.description: Flaky cod fillet with Mediterranean-style roasted vegetables and olive oil.
fields.instructions:
1. Preheat oven to 425°F
2. Season cod with lemon and herbs
3. Chop vegetables and toss with olive oil
4. Arrange on baking sheet
5. Bake for 15-20 minutes
6. Serve with lemon wedges

fields.title: Beef and Broccoli
fields.description: Tender beef strips with broccoli in a savory sauce. A healthier takeout alternative.
fields.instructions:
1.  Slice beef thinly against the grain
2. Marinate in soy sauce and cornstarch
3. Stir-fry beef until browned
4. Remove and stir-fry broccoli
5. Combine with sauce
6. Serve over brown rice

fields.title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
fields.description: Colorful bell peppers stuffed with ground turkey, quinoa, and vegetables, topped with cheese.
fields.instructions:
1. Cut tops off peppers and remove seeds
2. Cook quinoa
3. Brown ground turkey with vegetables
4. Mix turkey with quinoa and seasonings
5. Stuff peppers and top with cheese
6. Bake at 375°F for 30 minutes

fields.title: Shrimp Scampi with Whole Wheat Pasta
fields.description: Garlicky shrimp in white wine butter sauce over whole wheat linguine.
fields.instructions:
1. Cook whole wheat pasta
2. Sauté garlic in olive oil and butter
3. Add shrimp and cook until pink
4. Deglaze with white wine and lemon
5. Toss with pasta
6. Garnish with parsley and parmesan

fields.title: Moroccan Chicken Tagine
fields.description: Aromatic chicken stew with dried fruits, vegetables, and warm spices over couscous.
fields.instructions:
1. Brown chicken pieces
2. Sauté onions with spices
3. Add chicken, vegetables, and broth
4. Add dried apricots and dates
5. Simmer for 40 minutes
6. Serve over fluffy couscous

fields.title: Eggplant Parmesan
fields.description: Baked eggplant layered with marinara sauce and mozzarella cheese.  A lighter version of the classic.
fields.instructions:
1. Slice eggplant and salt to remove moisture
2. Brush with olive oil and bake until golden
3. Layer eggplant with marinara and cheese
4. Bake at 375°F for 25 minutes
5. Let rest 10 minutes
6. Serve with fresh basil

fields.title: Teriyaki Glazed Chicken Thighs
fields.description: Juicy chicken thighs with homemade teriyaki glaze, served with steamed vegetables and rice.
fields.instructions:
1. Make teriyaki sauce from soy sauce, honey, and ginger
2. Marinate chicken thighs
3. Bake chicken at 400°F for 25 minutes
4. Brush with glaze and broil
5. Steam broccoli and carrots
6. Serve with brown rice

fields.title: Vegetarian Chili
fields.description: Hearty three-bean chili loaded with vegetables and spices.  Perfect for meal prep.
fields.instructions:
1. Sauté onions, peppers, and garlic
2. Add chili powder and cumin
3. Add beans, tomatoes, and corn
4. Simmer for 30 minutes
5. Adjust seasoning
6. Serve with toppings of choice

fields.title: Lemon Garlic Pork Tenderloin
fields.description: Tender roasted pork with lemon, garlic, and herbs.  Served with roasted potatoes and green beans.
fields.instructions:
1. Marinate pork in lemon, garlic, and herbs
2. Sear pork on all sides
3. Roast at 400°F for 20-25 minutes
4. Rest before slicing
5. Roast potatoes and green beans alongside
6. Serve with pan juices

fields.title: Thai Basil Chicken
fields.description: Spicy Thai stir-fry with chicken, holy basil, and chilies over jasmine rice.
fields.instructions:
1. Cook jasmine rice
2. Stir-fry chicken with garlic and chilies
3. Add fish sauce and soy sauce
4. Add fresh basil leaves
5. Toss until basil wilts
6. Serve over rice with fried egg

fields.title: Spinach and Ricotta Stuffed Shells
fields.description: Large pasta shells filled with ricotta and spinach, baked in marinara sauce.
fields.instructions:
1. Cook jumbo shells
2. Mix ricotta, spinach, and parmesan
3. Stuff shells with mixture
4. Spread marinara in baking dish
5. Arrange shells and top with sauce
6. Bake at 375°F for 25 minutes

fields.title: Honey Mustard Salmon
fields.description: Sweet and tangy salmon with honey mustard glaze, served with quinoa and asparagus.
fields.instructions:
1. Mix honey, Dijon mustard, and garlic
2. Brush salmon with glaze
3. Bake at 400°F for 15 minutes
4. Cook quinoa
5. Roast asparagus
6. Serve together with lemon

fields.title: Chicken Cacciatore
fields.description: Italian braised chicken with tomatoes, peppers, onions, and herbs over polenta.
fields.instructions:
1. Brown chicken pieces
2.  Sauté peppers, onions, and mushrooms
3. Add tomatoes, wine, and herbs
4. Return chicken and simmer 30 minutes
5. Prepare creamy polenta
6. Serve chicken over polenta

fields.title: Tofu Pad Thai
fields.description: Authentic Pad Thai with crispy tofu, rice noodles, peanuts, and tamarind sauce.
fields.instructions:
1. Press and cube tofu, then fry until crispy
2. Soak rice noodles
3. Make Pad Thai sauce
4. Stir-fry garlic and vegetables
5. Add noodles and sauce
6. Top with peanuts, lime, and bean sprouts

fields.title: Mushroom Risotto
fields.description: Creamy Arborio rice cooked with mushrooms, parmesan, and white wine.
fields.instructions:
1. Heat vegetable broth
2. Sauté mushrooms and set aside
3. Toast Arborio rice
4. Add wine and let absorb
5. Gradually add broth, stirring constantly
6. Finish with butter, cheese, and mushrooms
